Subject: Basic message
Body:
Hello {Recipient},

we are not able to provide further information at the moment. Please wait until our college contacts you

Best,

Our company.

Subject: Meeting scheduling
Body:
Hello {Recipient},

we will be glad to see you in our office in {Address.City} at {Address.Street}. 

Looking forward to meeting you!

Best,

Our company.

Subject: Personal information query
Body:
Hello {Recipient},

you can reach {Name} by email at {Email} or by phone at {PhoneNumber}.

Best,

Our company
